ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Sinesis and Sinister both smile. Dracona frowns, nobody ever liked her, Plintissa even used her, but no more of that now, she was her own agent. But what

Sinesis and Sinister both smile. Dracona frowns, nobody ever liked her, Pli=
ntissa even used her, but no more of that now, she was her own agent. But w=
hat Dracona didn't want Sinesis and Sinister to know, is that she had escap=
ed from their programming and had been doing this stuff on her own. Dracona=
 walked around the Radicons and up to Sinesis and Sinister.

"I'm fine, Bli=
zzard, but I hurt right here." Sinister said, he touched his lips.

"How ca=
n you be fine? That damn 3D and stuff almost killed us! Personally, I ache =
all over!" Sinesis said.

"Yeah, I know." Sinister said. He winked to Sines=
is. Train Wreck turned to Dracona.

"I never felt so good, I feel like I ca=
n lock on a Rings of Saturn and break someones arm beyond repair!" Train Wr=
eck said.

"Good." Dracona simply replied.

Stranato and Airbomber look at =
each other, they were worried.

"Watch your back, Infectra, remember my tra=
ining tips." Stranato said. Airbomber wrapped his arms around Infectra, at =
all costs he would certainly give his life to protect her...
  ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent=
: Wednesday, July 26, 2000 8:23 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  *Infec=
tra runs after Airbomber and Stranato*


  *Blizzard and Twister stand ther=
e watching the three run away*

  Blizzard: Yeah, we're with you.

  *Twist=
er nods*

  *Blizzard walks up to Sinister*

  Blizzard: Are you okay?

  *=
Twister walks up to Sinesis*

  Twister: Are your damages bad?
    ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Se=
nt: Wednesday, July 26, 2000 7:45 PM
    Subject: Neo Beast Wars


    Deem=
os and Inzola walk up to Lunarpine and Ramulus.

    "Hello?" Deemos asked,=
 he was getting mad.

    Gangon's spark is almost DEAD, his spark was tryi=
ng to join with the Matrix.

    Plintissa gets up and Airbomber jumps next=
 to her. Dracona fires an ice beam. Airbomber jumps out of the way and his =
arm is frozen as he pushes Plintissa out of the way. Dracona laughs. But su=
ddenly.

    Dracona: What the?

    Dracona is grabbed and listed up, and =
gets the Dudley Death Drop from Stronghold and Blender. Blender does the Di=
amond Cutter sign.

    Blender: Bang!

    "Nothing like a good beating, a=
s long as your not the one recieving it." Stronghold said. Sinesis and Sini=
ster fired beams that blasted Blender and Stronghold from behind. They sudd=
enly had trouble moving. Sinesis and Sinister stood up smiling.

    "Take =
a licking and keep on ticking!" Sinister said. The device they were holding=
 was a reprograming device. Stronghold and Blender stared mindlessly. Stran=
ato looked on in shock. Dracona stands up and slaps Blender. He wakes up. S=
he slaps Stronghold and wakes him up. Blender turns and Train Wreck is runn=
ing by. Blender trips him up! Train Wreck is kicked in the ribs by Dracona.=
 Sinesis and Sinister fired at him with the reprogramming beam. Train Wreck=
 stares, looking more evil than before. Arrow is grabbed and whipped by Str=
onghold, right into Blender's clotheline. Sinesis and Sinister fire the bea=
m and hit Arrow as well. Arrow suddenly turns on Airbomber, firing at him. =
Airbomber moves out of the way as a beam hits the spot. Suddenly, the devic=
e explodes and blows off Sinesis' arm. Plintissa is holding a smoking blast=
er. Plintissa and Artist run as Sinesis fires furiously with his other arm.=
 Plintissa and Artist escape. Airbomber is helped up by Stranato.

    "Inf=
ectra, run!" Airbomber said. Stranato and Airbomber run, leaving their form=
er Radicon teammates behind. Train Wreck, Sinesis, Sinister, Arrow, Strongh=
old, and Blender stand next to their leader, Dracona.

    "Our device was =
destroyed!" Sinister said.

    "No matter, we'll get those 5." Dracona sai=
d.

    Sinesis pokes at where his arm was.

    "Blizzard, Twister, you wi=
th us?" Dracona asked.

    Stranato and Airbomber flee into the woods.

  =
  Plintissa and Artist run over a hill.

    Dracona contacts Zardus.

    =
"Zardus, this is anonymous bot looking for a good side, are you interested =
in a good team of 9 bots?" Dracona asks...
